captions.text:
Pop some caps with your Deadpool bottle opener
and devour these Kingdom Heart cookies. I'm
Jake and this is episode #14 of Game LÜT.

Stop playing with your claptrap and take a
sip out of your heat changing tetris coffee

mug. If you need a bigger pick me up use these
Bioshock Vigor pins and since you're a rebel

put on a Fireflies hoodie from the Last of
Us. Fend off some clickers with a Kratos foam

sword or slice through them with an incredibly
cool Raiden figure complete with choppable
watermelon.

But you're not afraid of anything, so cuddle
a Slenderman Plushie and check out these awesome
video game typography posters by Titanvex...

If you really want to impress with some art,
there's this $4,780.88 Nintendo and Sega Lego

mural. The mural took 6 months to create,
consists of over 10,500 pieces and is 75in
by 45in in size.

And for the ladies why not try a slick Mass
Effect N7 dress or depending on the occasion,

an assassin's creed hooded bikini. If it's
chilly out, there are these armor or bionic

leggings and a Pokéball onesie (which arguably
could be for a dude cus I'd wear one). Then

throw on a glow in the dark arc reactor necklace,
some portal long fall socks and tie it all
together with custom Portal kicks.

If none of that was interesting to you, then
you're probably a Mann...Co tshirt...or you

could be a monster like in Gaurodan. A free
game where you play a giant pterodactyl thing,

destroying cities, the military and other
giant creatures...

For the anti-monster crowd, try a Kaiju Hunter
tshirt on for size.

If you're bored at work or school make this
awesome DIY Minecraft Paper Machine by Kamibox.

Then cruise home in a RC Halo Warthog, pull
everything out of your winged batman backpack,

put all your books in between thor hammer
bookends, and cool off with some walking dead

ice cubes and these popsicle prints by artist
Chung Kong...

Kody Koala creates incredible custom toys
like this one of Wheatley, Zombie Wario, Steam
Punk Link, and Mech Sonic the HedgeHog.

Gain power with your mark of the outside pendant,
subscribe to Vsauce3 for more Game LUT and
Kneel to Loki Catbug.
I'm Jake and as always, thanks for watching.

title: Mass Effect DRESS and more!! -- Game LÜT #14
